amendment.description: To provide urgent assistance to support the demobilization process in Columbia.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3823 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3823 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S3940-3941; text: CR S3941) To provide urgent assistance to support the demobilization process in Columbia.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3823 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Leahy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3823 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
